body_html: Thanks @wodesuck ! When you say that you add it if and only if the name contains /rnn/while/, I'm unsure about something: are you referring to transformation applied by transform_graph ? If so, it means you changed the code from your PR to limit the scope to control loops ?
body_text: Thanks @wodesuck ! When you say that you add it if and only if the name contains /rnn/while/, I'm unsure about something: are you referring to transformation applied by transform_graph ? If so, it means you changed the code from your PR to limit the scope to control loops ?
body: Thanks @wodesuck ! When you say that you add it if and only if the name contains `/rnn/while/`, I'm unsure about something: are you referring to transformation applied by `transform_graph` ? If so, it means you changed the code from your PR to limit the scope to control loops ?
